description: CSS file containing theme management variables and styling for the application interface, including light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling with center-aligned text and responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling with background colors and layout for branding and navigation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application for visual interaction feedback.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for toggling themes with hover and active states.
